content.description: Sit start with a left hand on the sloping rail and a low right hand sidepull. From there, work slightly right along the rail, reach a right hand sidepull, follow to a left hand edge, cross over to a ball with the right hand, gain the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is very good though.
content.location: It climbs the south face of Sensayuma.

content.description: Sit start with a right hand edge and a left hand undercling in the cave. From there, bump the right hand to a large flat edge, match near it with the left hand, make a big move to a right hand edge, and finish up the remainder to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is great though.
content.location: It climbs the center of Sensayuma's north face.

content.description: Sit start matched on the sloping rail. From there, gain a left hand gaston, bump up to the good edge, match next to it, work a few bumps/edges to the lip, and mantel on top of the boulder.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the south face of Sensayuma.

content.description: Sit start matched on a sloping jug. From there, cross over to a right hand teardrop edge, gain a left hand mono-pocket, then reach a good left hand edge, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad will work. The landing is great.
content.location: It climbs the west face arete of Sensayuma.
